page.title: 12AN INTERVIEW IN SETTLE (PT2)
page.content: {Q.Was there a Settle Carnival?}A.I don't remember a carnival but there was an agricultural show which was similar.{Q.What did you do at school?} A.Reading,writing,arithmetic,history, geography,gymnastics,gardening,dancing ,sewing and knitting.{Q.What sort of {clothes did you wear when you were 7?} A.Home made clothes,little white pinnies,and a lot of the children wore clogs or lace_up boots.{Q.What did you {have for breakfast?}A.Perhaps a boiled egg or toast. {By Paul Brickles and { Tom Hall {
